verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2568>month<s%>, in the fifth day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, as I <S%H3427>sat<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3027>me<s%>, that the hand of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> fell there upon <S%H5307>me<s%>.

Then I <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, <S%H1823>and<s%>, lo, a likeness as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>; from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4295>downward<s%>, <S%H784>fire<s%>; and from his <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H2096>brightness<s%>, as it were <S%H5869>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal<s%>.

And he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> me by a <S%H6734>lock<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>; and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%> between <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> court that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>; where was the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>, which provoketh to <S%H7069>jealousy<s%>.
And <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H4758>there<s%>, according to the appearance that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> now the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>. So I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H6828>behold<s%>, northward of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> this <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> in the <S%H872>entry<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7200>seest<s%> thou what they <S%H6213>do<s%>? even the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> do <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7368>here<s%>, that I should go far off from my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>? But thou shalt <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> yet other <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>; and when I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H259>behold<s%>, a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H2864>dig<s%> now in the <S%H7023>wall<s%>: and when I had <S%H2864>digged<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, <S%H259>behold<s%>, a <S%H6607>door<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>me<s%>, Go in, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they do <S%H6213>here<s%>.

So I went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%>; and <S%H8403>behold<s%>, every form of creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, and <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> upon the <S%H7023>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and the <S%H6282>odor<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> what the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of <S%H4906>imagery<s%>? for they <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> us <S%H3068>not<s%>; Jehovah hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
He <S%H559>said<s%> also unto <S%H7725>me<s%>, Thou shalt again <S%H7200>see<s%> yet other <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> which was toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>; and <S%H3427>behold<s%>, there sat the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> for <S%H8542>Tammuz<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, Hast thou seen <S%H1121>this<s%>, O son of <S%H120>man<s%>? thou shalt <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> yet <S%H1419>greater<s%> abominations than <S%H8441>these<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; and <S%H6607>behold<s%>, at the door of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, between the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, were about <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, with their <S%H268>backs<s%> toward the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east<s%>; and they were <S%H7812>worshipping<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, Hast thou seen <S%H1121>this<s%>, O son of <S%H120>man<s%>? Is it a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that they <S%H6213>commit<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H4390>here<s%>? for they have filled the <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and have <S%H7725>turned<s%> again to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>: <S%H7971>and<s%>, lo, they put the <S%H2156>branch<s%> to their <S%H639>nose<s%>.

Therefore will I also <S%H6213>deal<s%> in <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>; and though they <S%H7121>cry<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, yet will I not hear <S%H8085>them<s%>.
